Excellent. So Ashmit, what do you know about the story of Madhurga?
Once upon a time there was a wicked demon called Mohit Shashod.
He wanted to be immortal and very powerful.
So he did penance to please Lord Tromba, who is the creator of the universe.
Lord Tromba appeared in front of Mohit Shashod and offered him a boon.
Mohit Shashod asked if he could be immortal and very powerful.
Lord Tromba disagreed to this and said that he could not make anybody immortal.
Then Mohit Shashod asked if it would be possible if only a woman would be able to kill him and not any male person.
Lord Tromba agreed to this and gave him the boon.
After this Mohit Shashod got really happy and thought that he would be invincible now and started destroying everything and being very cruel.
He started chasing all the gods away and challenging all bad things.
The gods escaped to Lord Shiv in the mountains of the Himalayas.
Lord Shiv heard about all this and got very angry at Mohit Shashod.
So Lord Shiv made a woman figure with his powers.
All the gods gave her all their powers and lots of weapons.
This woman was named Durga.
After this Durga went into a battle with Mohit Shashod.
During the battle Mohit Shashod changed his form into lots of other animals.
First he changed his form into an elephant.
After this Durga changed his form into an elephant.
At the last of all he turned himself into a buffalo and Madhurga stabbed a trident into the buffalo's chest and killed him.
After this it was a very happy place to live on.
